com.ems.dao

Class UserDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ems.dao.UserDao

  • public class UserDao
extends java.lang.Object
    UserDao is the class that performs actions on the table User of the database Code inspired by http://danielniko.wordpress.com/2012/04/17/simple-crud-using-jsp-servlet-and-mysql/
    Author:
    Luca Barazzuol
